description:
Super GALS! Kotobuki Ran focuses on a teenage girl named http://anidb.net/ch3671 [Kotobuki Ran]. Her father, mother, brother, grandfather and grandmother are police officers. However, she doesn`t want to be a policewoman... after all she just want is to have fun as a GAL. Hanging out in Shibuya with her friends, she always get in some kind of funny trouble.
Source: AnimeNfo

REGULAR.description:
Ran is not your typical Gal. But what is a Gal? And what are “ironclad rules of being a Gal?” Ran Kotobuki will teach you! Join Ran as she helps spread world peace, all while being a Gal!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Tenka no Gal Ikeike: Kotobuki Ran
The World`s Greatest Gal Go, Go Ran Kotobuki!
天下のギャル♥イケイケ→寿蘭

REGULAR.description:
Ran is promised 500 yen to right 10 wrongs. Her first right was catching a girl who tried to steal a purse, but will it turn out to be as mundane a theft as it appears?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Phone Tag Gets Chilling! Shibuya Is Thrilling! The Great Dragnet
Shibuya Harahara: Daisousasen
渋谷♥ハラハラ→大捜査線

REGULAR.description:
Things get creepy when Miyu receives a weird love letter in her shoe locker. Will Yamato come to Miyu’s rescue? Ran’s back on the case to help her friend!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Girl`s Feelings! Hearts Reeling! Red Streak or Not, Miyu`s Taken!
Onnagokoro Dokidoki: Aka Mesh
オンナゴコロ♥ドキドキ→赤メッシュ

REGULAR.description:
The Gals are telling their love fortunes, but the future looks bleak for Ran. But when Ran does find love, is he really the right guy for her?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Aru Aru? Nai Nai? Otokoun?
Have Got? Have Not? Luck with Guys!
アルアル?♥ナイナイ?→おとこ運?

REGULAR.description:
Its exam time and Ran is struggling through them. The bigger problem is top-of-her-class Aya falls several ranks in the scores. She distances herself from Ran and Miyu to get better grades, but what about her Gal life?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Fresh Start? Broken Heart? Is It Over with Aya?
Heart Barabara: Aya to Zekkou!?
ハート♥バラバラ→綾と絶交!?

REGULAR.description:
Ran’s got a new swimsuit, so she wants to show it off at the pool! But her day off could have severe consequences when the ’Bukuro Gals try to take over Shibuya. Aya’s after Rei and Yuuya’s after Ran in their fun day at the pool.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gals Rule the Pool! Too Cool! Junior Detectives!
Pool Wakuwaku: Chuubou Deka!
プール♥ワクワク→チューボー刑事!

REGULAR.description:
Miyu’s trying to do 100 good deeds to fulfill her wish, but her past might catch up to her and balance out those good deeds.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Black Shadow Creeping Up Behind Her! Miyu Is a Target!
Kuroi Kage Hitahita: Nerawareta Miyu
黒い影♥ヒタヒタ→狙われた美由

REGULAR.description:
Thugs from an old gang have attacked Miyu and everyone is trying to figure out who the culprit really is. Detective Ran Kotobuki is back on the case to help her ailing friend.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Gal`s Heart! A Guilty Heart! Miyu`s Past Catches Up!
Kokoro Chikuchiku: Miyu no Kako
ココロ♥チクチク→美由の過去

REGULAR.description:
In Shibuya, Sayo and Masato are protecting the peace from ne’er-do-wells. Under the watchful eye of Yamato, Sayo’s learning what it really means to be a police officer. But when Sayo gets kidnapped, no one in the Kotobuki family really knows what’s going
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Memories! Tearful Memories! Sayo`s Been Kidnapped?
Omoide Boroboro: Sayo ga Yuukai?
想い出♥ボロボロ→沙夜が誘拐?

REGULAR.description:
Second Place Yuuya is trying to confess to Ran, but he’s having a little trouble doing so. Then Tatsuki Kuroi appears and challenges Ran’s parapara dancing abilities as things heat up a little in Shibuya.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Second Place Yuya? He`s First Place Nervous! A Rival Appears!
Yuuya Sowasowa: Rival Toujou!
裕也♥ソワソワ→ライバル登場!

REGULAR.description:
Yuuya’s a little down over being second place, but when Ran calls him up, all his worries seem to disappear. Things get complicated as Ran decides to hold a contest to decide who will become her boyfriend! What’ll become of Yuuya?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Crisscrossing Shibuya! Fun Fun! It`s a Grand Prix!
Shibuya Oudan Shikichiki: Grand Prix
渋谷横断♥チキチキ→グランプリ

REGULAR.description:
When Ran and Kendo Club member Shiori have to do a makeup class, they decide to hang out in Shibuya afterwards. But all Shiori wants is to dress like a girl, and Gal extraordinaire Ran is there to help.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Promise Kept! Bye-Bye! Kendo Girl!
Yakusoku Bye-Bye: Kendou Shoujo
約束♥バイバイ→剣道少女

REGULAR.description:
When Miyu and Aya wish Ran were a little more studious, she’s suddenly and suspiciously acting different. The Junior Detectives are back on the case to find out what happened to Ran!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Super Debutante! Super Goody-Goody! Ran Kotobuki!
Super Ojou-sama Buriburi: Kotobuki Ran
超お嬢様♥ブリブリ→寿蘭

REGULAR.description:
Country Girl Maki comes to Shibuya to be an apprentice to Ran. But when Maki wants her idol to demonstrate how much of a Gal Ran truly is, will she be able to survive her own Ironclad Rules for Gals?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Maki Pikapika: Gal 1-nensei!
Meet Maki! The Shiny, New First Year Gal!
真希♥ピカピカ→ギャル1年生!

REGULAR.description:
When Ran wins a snowboard in a lottery, she’s taking everyone snowboarding! But in the summer? However, Yuuya might gain a leg up over Tatsukichi in the competition for Ran.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Cold Revenge? It`s Burning Hot! Snowboard Battle!
Revenge Meramera: Snowbo Battle
リベンジ♥メラメラ→スノボバトル!

REGULAR.description:
Two years ago, Miyu was a troublemaker in a gang and the school doesn’t know what to do. But when Ran gets caught bringing in snacks and music to school, the teachers coerce her into rehabilitating Miyu.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dappled Sunlight! Sparkling Away! A Romantic Anniversary!
Komorebi Kirakira: Ren`ai Kinenbi
木洩れ陽♥キラキラ→恋愛記念日

REGULAR.description:
When Miyu brings in a romance personality test, Aya gets worried about her results. Ran and her friends spur Aya on to confess her true love to Rei.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Feelings of Love! Start Wavering: Aya Confesses?
Koigokoro Yurayura: Aya ga Kokuhaku!?
恋ゴコロ♥ユラユラ→綾が告白!?

REGULAR.description:
Odaiba! It’s vacation time for Ran and her friends, and this time Ran is playing Aya’s wingman in the quest for Rei’s love. But when Ran gets separated from the rest of the group, she finds herself accepting a challenge from Mami.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Odaiba Bachibachi: Daikessen!
Odaiba Excitement! Crackling Action! The Great Final Battle!
お台場♥バチバチ→大決戦!

REGULAR.description:
Ran’s broke again, so Yamato suggests she gets a job. But he gets a shock when he finds Ran when at the beach while he’s trying to relax with Miyu.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Taiyou Sansan: Natsu Onna
The Sun, Sun, Sun Summer Girl!
太陽♥サンサン→夏オンナ!

REGULAR.description:
Mami’s broken up with her boyfriend, but her first love is coming to Japan. To top it all off, he wants to go to Shibuya! What’ll happens when Ran shows up?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dreamy-Eyed Mami! Her First Love!
Mami Rin Meromero: Hatsukoi no Hito
マミリン♥メロメロ→初恋の人

REGULAR.description:
Summer break is over, but Ran’s neglected her summer homework. However, if she wins the sports festival for her class, Mr. Nakanishi will look the other way on her homework. Can Ran pull it off?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hisshou Go Go: Taiikusai
It`s Certain Victory! Go! Go! Sports Fest
必勝♥ゴーゴー→体育祭

REGULAR.description:
It’s Meisho’s culture festival and the Gals got tickets from Rei. Yamato’s hired the Junior Detectives to make sure no cute Meisho guys take away Miyu, Aya and Rei are still working out their relationship, and Ran and Mami clash for Meisho Queen.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gakusai Parapara: Meishou Queen
High School Culture Fest! Para-Para Meisho Queen!
学祭♥パラパラ→明匠クイーン

REGULAR.description:
Gunjo’s sore over losing the Sports Festival and he’s taking out his frustrations on class captain, Takezawa. He’s also got it out for Ran over winning the Festival. But it’s certain that Ran won’t stand for this kind of injustice.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hagase Beriberi: Kyoushi no Mekki
Tear It Off! Rip, Rip! Teacher`s Gold Leaf Exterior!
はがせ♥ベリベリ→教師のメッキ

REGULAR.description:
The Gals are telling fortunes again and today happens to be Ran’s luckiest day of the year. But the next day, Ran’s gushing over her luck and tries the fortune game again only to find that her unluckiest days are ahead.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Machida e Saru Saru: Tatsukichi Shitsuren!?
Off to Machida! The Monkey Leaves! Tatsukichi Gets Dumped?!
町田へ♥サル去る→タツキチ失恋!?

REGULAR.description:
The Gals are out looking for jobs again, but they’re being turned down for their looks. When they do find a job at a pastry shop, they have to sell 3,000 Gal pastries by the end of the day. With the help of Rei and Yuuya, it could happen!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Yamato Majimaji: Propose!?
Yamato`s Dead Serious! Yamato Proposes?!
大和♥マジマジ→プロポーズ!?

REGULAR.description:
When Ran wins a sleep learning pillow in a raffle, she accidentally brainwashes herself into wanting to become a police officer. But what will happen of Ran’s normal Gal life?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hard-Working Super Cop, Ran Kotobuki!
Super Cop Baribari: Kotobuki Ran
超刑事♥バリバリ→寿蘭

REGULAR.description:
It’s another Tatsuki.  He’s an easy-going boy on a skateboard in Shibuya, and he resembles someone... Who’s the guy? Naoki - Tatsuki’s brother!  When he falls in love with Ran, it’s a brother-brother ramen battle for her love!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Brother Kichikichi: Naokichi Kenzan!
Brother! Kichi-Kichi! Naokichi Appears!
ブラザー♥キチキチ→ナオキチ見参!

REGULAR.description:
Naoki falls for Miyu, but what will he do when he discovers she’s in love with Yamato? Then, when Ran loses her wallet, Yuya sets out to find it.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Yuuya Nakunaku: Otoko o Kataru
Yuya! Crying! Talks About Being a Man
裕也♥ナクナク→男を語る

REGULAR.description:
Mami discovers that her boyfriend is cheating and when Yuya shows up to console her - it’s pure love!  However, when she finds out Yuya only has eyes for Ran, she challenges Ran to a fight!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mami-rin Love Love: Yuuya ni Horeru
Mami-rin! Lovey-Dovey! Falls for Yuya!
マミリン♥ラブラブ→裕也にほれる

REGULAR.description:
Mami’s got a new hair extension! But what’s this? Mysterious men have shown up to take it away!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bukuro Garugaru: Exte no Nazo
Bukuro! In Circles! Mystery of the Extension!
ブクロ♥グルグル→エクステの謎

REGULAR.description:
Legendary gal idol Towa Himejima returns to Shibuya to open up a new café called Palm Tree! But when someone tries to disturb her business, Ran takes it personally and searches for the criminal.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Welcome Ukiuki: Kaiten! Palm Tree
Welcome! Exciting! Palm Tree Grand Opening!
ウェルカム♥ウキウキ→開店! パームツリー

REGULAR.description:
After Miyu’s cell phone goes missing, Ran gets an anonymous call, telling her to stop being a gal or Miyu’s cell phone will be broken!  Then suddenly, Aya has her train pass stolen. Who’s behind it all?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ran-pyon Iraira: Aratana Rival!?
Ran-pyon! Irritated! A New Rival?!
蘭ぴょん♥イライラ→新たなライバル!?

REGULAR.description:
Ran’s got a wannabe rival on the scene - Kasumi Tsukino. When Ran doesn’t take her seriously, Kasumi tries to get even by setting up traps for her in Shibuya.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kasumi Mukamuka: Revenge Daisakusen!
Kasumi! Pissed! The Great Plot for Revenge!
カスミ♥ムカムカ→リベンジ大作戦!

REGULAR.description:
Aya starts having problems with Otohata and when a new boy named Katase arrives on the scene, she starts to doubt her relationship with Otohata.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Aya-ppe - Teary-Eyed - Otohata Syndrome
Aya-ppe Uruuru: Otohata-byou
綾っぺ♥ウルウル→乙幡病

REGULAR.description:
Aya is caught between the two men in her life - Otohata and Katase.  Who will she choose?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ren`ai Yohou Moyamoya: Otohata nochi Katase!?
Romantic Forecast! Unclear! Otohata Then Katase?!
恋愛予報♥モヤモヤ→乙幡のち片瀬!?

REGULAR.description:
Maki Komine invites Ran to her family’s hotel. With Sayo, Masato and Naoki in tow, it’s time for some gal fun at the hot spring! But when a big crime is committed, and Ran becomes the prime suspect!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hot Spring! Viva Viva! The Gal Incident in the Northern Steam Clouds
Onsen Viva Viva: Kita no Yukemuri Gal Jiken
温泉♥ビバビバ→北の湯けむりギャル事件

REGULAR.description:
When Mami’s big secret is revealed, she gets seriously worried about her relationship with Yuya. Will he still want to be with her?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Himitsu Barebare: Mami-rin no Kiki!
Secret! Revelead! Mami-rin in Danger!
秘密♥バレバレ→マミリンの危機!

REGULAR.description:
Naka-teach asks Ran for a weird favor.  He wants her to make rounds with him on his night duty at school because he saw a ghost?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Heart! Aching! Otohata`s Words
Kokoro Jinjin: Otohata no Kotoba
ココロ♥ジンジン→乙幡の言葉

REGULAR.description:
It’s Christmas time! Ran and Tatsuki get involved in an incident where their relationship is tested!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Christmas Eve! Jingle-Jingle! Emergency Bell of Love
Seiya Rinrin: Koi no Hijou Bell
聖夜♥リンリン→恋の非常ベル

REGULAR.description:
It’s New Year’s Day and Sayo is upset when Ran gets a bigger New Year’s gift than she did, and dreams of being the older sister. When she buys a good luck bag, it switches Sayo and Ran’s personalities!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ran-pyon Kurakura: Sayo ni Naru!?
Ran-pyon! Dizzy! Becomes Sayo?!
蘭ぴょん♥クラクラ→沙夜になる!?

REGULAR.description:
When Shibuya is in trouble, Maru-Q Moon comes to rescue! The whole town is talking about her! Who is this hero in disguise?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shibuya Senshi Nazonazo: Maru-Q Moon
Shibuya Soldier! Mysterious! Maru-Q Moon!
渋谷戦士♥ナゾナゾ→マルキュームーン

REGULAR.description:
Taizo remembers the days when Ran was in elementary school and wanted to become a cop!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Taizo! Enthousiastic! Police Training Project!
Taizou Norinori: Keikan Yousei Project!
泰三♥ノリノリ→警官養成プロジェクト!

REGULAR.description:
Rie secretly admires Junichi Ota who saved her in elementary school when bullies picked on her.  Why can’t she express her feelings to him? And why does he seem to be avoiding her?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Junjou Mojimoji: Rie no Koibana
Pure Love! Nervous! Rie`s Love Tale
純情♥モジモジ→理恵の恋バナ

REGULAR.description:
When Odaiba Cop’s Detective Kudoh dies on duties, Sayo’s not the only one crying.  Matsuda, who plays the role of Detective Kudo, can’t seem to find another gig and winds up back in Shibuya where he used to hang out when he was younger...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Junshoku Shikushiku: Odaiba Shark Saigo no Hi!
Killed in the Line of Duty! Weeping! Odaiba Shark`s Final Day!
殉職♥シクシク→お台場シャーク最後の日!

REGULAR.description:
It’s Valentine’s Day!  Tatsuki wants chocolate from Ran, but Ran doesn’t seem inclined. Is their relationship over? They’re not the only ones having trouble. Rei seems to be looking at another girl lately…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Koi Moyou Iroiro: Valentine Day
Signs of Love! various! Valentine`s Day
恋模様♥イロイロ→バレンタインデー

REGULAR.description:
Is the Kuroi family in serious trouble?  A new ramen noodle chain opens up near the Kuroi’s noodle house, and begins spreading vicious rumors about them!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Clash! Slurp! Slurp! Ramen Battle!
Gekitotsu Churuchuru: Ramen Battle!
激突♥チュルチュル→ラーメンバトル!

REGULAR.description:
Kasumi falls in love with a coat she sees at a store that resembles a coat one of Kasumi’s role models wore.  Unfortunately for Kasumi, Ran also has her eye on the coat!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kasumi Pokapoka: Akogare no Coat
Kasumi! Toasty Warm! Her Dream Coat
カスミ♥ポカポカ→憧れのコート

REGULAR.description:
When things get rocky for Yuya and Mami, Mami blames it on Ran and challenges her to a final showdown at the Girls’ Festival!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gal Battle Gangan: Mami-rin Hakyoku!?
Gal Battle! Fierce! Mami-rin Finished?!
ギャルバトル♥ガンガン→マミリン破局!?

REGULAR.description:
When Miyu should to be studying for finals, she’s got to support her family or else they’ll be evicted!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Heartbreak! Painful! Miyu`s Place to Call Home
Shoushin Hirihiri: Miyu no Kaeru Basho
傷心♥ヒリヒリ→美由の帰る場所

REGULAR.description:
Finals have started and if Ran fails even one exam, she’ll repeat the entire first year again!  Talk about pressure!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Koi no Giwaku Zawazawa: Tsumetai Harukaze
Misgivings of the Heart! Stirring! Cold Spring Breeze
恋の疑惑♥ザワザワ→冷たい春風

REGULAR.description:
Aya keeps hearing rumors about Ran and Rei.  Can she find the courage to ask Rei if the rumors are true?  What will he say?  And what about her friendship with Ran?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Friendship! Smiles! ID Tags of the Heart
Yuujou Nikoniko: Kokoro no ID Plate
友情♥ニコニコ→心のIDプレート

REGULAR.description:
It’s one year later!  What’s happened to all of our favorite gals?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Goodbye! Ran-ran! The Skies of Shibuya Remain Unchanging
Sayonara Ranran: Shibuya no Sora wa Kawarinaku
さよなら♥ランラン→渋谷の空は変わりなく
